paragraphs.title: Goals
paragraphs.body:
The project SENSE (Strengthening Cities and Enhancing Neighbourhood Sense of Belonging) will create a network of interconnected virtual worlds that mirror real cities, aligning with the EU Smart Communities initiative. 
 The project focuses on utilising EU data infrastructure and complying with interoperability standards to develop practical use cases for CitiVerse, which will benefit local authorities and citizens.

paragraphs.title: Pilot City Kiel, Germany
paragraphs.body: Civic Engagement Through Immersive Virtual Experiences The Kiel pilot will create an interactive virtual environment within CitiVerse, combining marine conservation education and cultural heritage exploration. Residents, tourists, and emergency services will engage in immersive scenarios, fostering awareness, resilience, and shared storytelling to strengthen community identity and participation.

paragraphs.title: Pilot City Cartagena, Spain
paragraphs.body: Driving Sustainability Through Smart Innovation The Cartagena pilot will harness immersive technologies, citizen participation, and real-time data to support sustainable urban development. By enhancing city planning, promoting green mobility, and engaging SMEs, it fosters low-cost, scalable solutions that strengthen environmental policy, interoperability, and economic growth.
